entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gimli 04:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 18. POP 60%
